Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2009...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to San Diego on 5/30/2009 (Going to SDN: 1B A. Beltran. Going to LAN: SS A. Kennedy)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/30/2012, off Dario Baeza (SF)...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 8/2/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/2014, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2014, hitting .390 with 10 HR, 34 RBI...
Won World Championship with San Diego in 2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/18/2015, hitting .333 with 6 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/23/2016, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 7/19/2016...
Injured on 9/9/2016 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from San Diego to Arizona on 4/1/2017 (Going to SDN: P J. Cano, P A. Carranza, P A. Conley. Going to ARI: 1B A. Beltran)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2017, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $16,666,666 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/20/2018, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/25/2020, hitting .393 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 9/1/2020 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/26/2020, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $11,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 6/22/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/2/2022, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago (A) on 7/4/2023...
Drove in 8 runs against Kansas City on 8/9/2023...
